00024 class CMError implements CMClass {
00025  
00029  private $errorStack = array();
00030  
00034  private $verboseLevel = CMErrorType::Warning;
00035  
00041  private static $GlobalStack = false;
00042  
00050  private $exitLevel = CMErrorType::Fatal;
00051  
00060  public function setExitLevel($exitLevel = CMErrorType::Fatal) {
00061   $this->$exitLevel = $exitLevel;
00062   return true;
00063  }
00064  
00071  public function errors($level = CMErrorType::Warning) {
00072   // check global stack
00073   if(CMError::$GlobalStack !== false && CMError::$GlobalStack !== $this)
00074    return CMError::$GlobalStack->errors();
00075   
00076   if(is_array($this->errorStack)) {
00077    // create a new stack of filtered errors
00078    $r = array();
00079    foreach($this->errorStack as $e) {
00080     if($e['_type'] >= $level)
00081      array_push($r, $e);
00082    }
00083    
00084    return $r;
00085   } return $this->errorStack->errorStack;
00086  }
00087  
00096  public function isErrors($level = CMErrorType::Warning) {
00097   // check global stack
00098   if(CMError::$GlobalStack !== false && CMError::$GlobalStack !== $this)
00099    return CMError::$GlobalStack->isErrors();
00100   
00101   if(is_array($this->errorStack)) {
00102    // count filtered errors
00103    $r = 0;
00104    foreach($this->errorStack as $e) {
00105     if($e['_type'] >= $level)
00106      ++$r;
00107    }
00108    return $r > 0;
00109   }
00110   
00111   return $this->errorStack->isErrors();
00112  }
00113  
00121  public function countErrors($level = CMErrorType::Warning) {
00122   // check global stack
00123   if(CMError::$GlobalStack !== false && CMError::$GlobalStack !== $this)
00124    return CMError::$GlobalStack->countErrors();
00125   
00126   if(is_array($this->errorStack)) {
00127    // count filtered errors
00128    $r = 0;
00129    foreach($this->errorStack as $e) {
00130     if($e['_type'] >= $level)
00131      ++$r;
00132    }
00133    
00134    return $r;
00135   }
00136   
00137   return $this->errorStack->countErrors();
00138  }
00139  
00148  public function dealtWithAll() {
00149   // check global stack
00150   if(CMError::$GlobalStack !== false && CMError::$GlobalStack !== $this)
00151    return CMError::$GlobalStack->dealtWithAll();
00152   
00153   if(is_array($this->errorStack))
00154    $this->errorStack = array();
00155   else $this->errorStack->dealtWithAll();
00156   return true;
00157  }
00158  
00172  public static function PrintBackTrace($error) {
00173   echo CMError::GenerateBackTrace($error);
00174   return true;
00175  }
00176  
00182  public static function GenerateBackTrace($error) {
00183   $r = "<pre>\nError thrown:";
00184   if(isset($error['_reason']))
00185    $r .= "\n  Reason: $error[_reason]";
00186    
00187   foreach($error as $k => $v) {
00188    if(substr($k, 0, 1) == '_')
00189     continue;
00190    $r .= "\n  '$k' => $v";
00191   }
00192   
00193   $r .= "\n  Back Trace:";
00194   $j = 1;
00195   for($i = count($error['_backtrace']) - 1; $i >= 2; --$i) {
00196    $msg = CMError::GenerateErrorMessage($error['_backtrace'][$i]);
00197    $r .= "\n    $j. " . substr($msg, strpos($msg, 'from') + 5);
00198    ++$j;
00199   }
00200   return "$r\n</pre>";
00201  }
00202  
00216  public static function PrintError($error) {
00217   echo "Reason: ", $error['_reason'], "\n";
00218   CMError::PrintBackTrace($error);
00219  }
00220  
00226  private static function GenerateErrorMessage($a) {
00227   $msg = "Error thrown ";
00228   if(isset($a['file']))
00229    $msg .= "from " . $a['file'];
00230   if(isset($a['line']))
00231    $msg .= " at line " . $a['line'];
00232   $msg .= " in ";
00233   if(isset($a['class']))
00234    $msg .= $a['class'] . "::";
00235   if(isset($a['function']))
00236    $msg .= $a['function'] . '().';
00237   return $msg;
00238  }
00239  
00248  private function pushError($type, $attr) {
00249   // check global stack
00250   if(CMError::$GlobalStack !== false && CMError::$GlobalStack !== $this)
00251    return CMError::$GlobalStack->pushError($type, $attr);
00252   
00253   if(is_array($this->errorStack)) {
00254    $toStack = array(
00255     '_type' => $type,
00256     '_backtrace' => debug_backtrace()
00257    );
00258    foreach($attr as $k => $v)
00259     $toStack[$k] = $v;
00260     
00261    array_push($this->errorStack, $toStack);
00262    
00263    // return message
00264    return $this->GenerateBackTrace($toStack);
00265   }
00266   else
00267    $this->errorStack->pushError($type, $attr);
00268   
00269   return false;
00270  }
00271  
00282  public function throwGeneric($type, $msg, array $attr = array()) {
00283   // if this is a fatal error, exit the script
00284   if($type === CMErrorType::Fatal)
00285    die($msg);
00286    
00287   // print the message
00288   $print = false;
00289   if($msg != "") {
00290    if(is_array($this->errorStack) && $type >= $this->verboseLevel)
00291     $print = true;
00292    else if($this->errorStack instanceof CMError && $type >= $this->errorStack->verboseLevel)
00293     $print = true;
00294   }
00295   
00296   // push the error onto the stack
00297   $attr['_reason'] = $msg;
00298   $report = $this->pushError($type, $attr);
00299   if($print)
00300    echo $report . "\n";
00301   
00302   return false;
00303  }
00304  
00315  public function throwDebug($msg, $attr = array()) {

00447  public function useErrorStack($newStack) {
00448   // reset
00449   if($newStack === NULL || $newStack === false) {
00450    $this->errorStack = array();
00451    return true;
00452   }
00453   
00454   // must be a CMError
00455   if($newStack instanceof CMError) {
00456    $this->errorStack = $newStack;
00457    return true;
00458   }
00459   
00460   // failed
00461   return false;
00462  }
00463  
00476  public static function SetGlobalStack($newStack) {
00477   // reset
00478   if($newStack === NULL || $newStack === false) {
00479    CMError::$GlobalStack = false;
00480    return true;
00481   }
00482   
00483   // must be a CMError
00484   if($newStack instanceof CMError) {
00485    // the new stacks actual stack must be an array to stop possible infinite loops
00486    if(!is_array($newStack->errorStack))
00487     $newStack->errorStack = array();
00488     
00489    CMError::$GlobalStack = $newStack;
00490    return true;
00491   }
00492   
00493   // failed
00494   return false;
00495  }
00496  
00504  public function printAllErrors() {
00505   // loop through the stack
00506   foreach($this->errorStack as $e) {
00507    CMError::PrintError($e);
00508    echo "\n";
00509   }
00510   return false;
00511  }
00512  
00516  public function __toString() {
00517   return "<" . get_class($this) . ">";
00518  }
